description: The soapy material of Bubbling Bubbles allowed the Bubbles to keep their shape for quite a time until hitting their targets. By filling their stomachs with a special secret gas, these bubbles could burst with even more force across a larger radius.
tooltip: The soapy material of Bubbling Bubbles allowed the Bubbles to keep their shape for quite a time until hitting their targets. By filling their stomachs with a special secret gas, these bubbles could burst with even more force across a larger radius. (Splash Damage radius of Bubbling is doubled)
